oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Breakfast At The Opry - 1953-04-04 - Part 1 [date unconfirmed]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Broadcast of WSM's Breakfast At The Opry, part 1 - likely 1953-04-04 (unconfirmed) based on Hank Snow and Ernest Tubb returning from Korea on 1953-04-02. Personnel include Dave Overton (announcer), Eddie Hill (host), Hank Snow (performer), Buford Gentry (performer with Hank Snow), Tommy Vaden (performer with Hank Snow), James 'Sleepy' McDaniels (performer with Hank Snow), Chet Atkins (guest), and Ken Marvin (guest). Held at the Noel Hotel, Nashville, TN. Sponsored by Rock City. Names of audience members are unconfirmed.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Snow
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Dave Overton) -- Theme -- Dave Overton introduces Eddie Hill -- Opening statement (Eddie Hill) -- Eddie Hill and Dave Overton talk to members of the audience -- Eddie Hill introduces Hank Snow -- Hank Snow talks -- Honeymoon On A Rocketship (Hank Snow) -- Rock City commercial (Dave Overton) -- Eddie Hill introduces Hank Snow to audience member Martha Bagel -- Dave Overton and Eddie Hill introduce Hank Snow to audience member Karen Jeanette Rhodes -- Dave Overton introduces Eddie Hill to audience members Betty Anne Hobbs and Mrs C. S. Fontalou
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Breakfast at the opry (Radio program); Overton, Dave; Hill, Eddie, 1921-1994; Snow, Hank; Atkins, Chet; Marvin, Ken; Gentry, Buford; Vaden, Tommy; McDaniels, James Sleepy
